title: Looking for any ranked team
body: Im a pretty active silver player who plays for fun most of the time though can get  fairly serious in ranked games. Im currently ranked silver ( was gold earlier on in the season if that means anything to you) i am willing to play any role however my top adc and mid are probably more noticeably better. I am fully capable of using team speak or whatever other speaking tool you and the team wish to use or none at all if thats how it is. Not sure what more i could add so if you are interested in having me feel free to add me on Hashashin.

replies.body: Are you still looking for a ranked team? :)
Yea i am only in 2 teams atm out of 5 so add me in game if you want to
